title: Sunset Luau
shortDescription: Immerse yourself in Tanitian culture with an unforgettable evening under the stars. Watch hula dancers sway to island rhythms while enjoying a buffet of traditional dishes. It’s the perfect way to end your day, with something for everyone.
details: Held along the beach or in tropical garden settings, the Sunset Luau is a festive celebration of Taniti’s cultural heritage.
Guests are greeted with flower leis and invited to sample authentic dishes like roasted pig, taro root, and tropical fruits.
Live performances include traditional hula, fire knife dancing, and music performed by local artists.
It’s a family-friendly event that’s often included in resort packages, drawing both visitors and locals alike.
Be sure to bring your camera—the sunset views and vibrant performances make for stunning memories.
imageAltText: Hula dancers performing at sunset during a luau event
heroText: Enjoy fire dances, traditional cuisine, and music beneath the evening sky—Taniti’s most festive tradition.

title: Taniti Surf Classic
shortDescription: Join the excitement as top surfers compete on Taniti’s legendary waves. The Taniti Surf Classic combines extreme sports, beach fun, and island energy for a thrilling day at the shore.
details: The Surf Classic draws international surf champions to challenge Taniti’s renowned reef breaks.
Held every summer, the event transforms the main beach into a vibrant festival atmosphere.
Enjoy food trucks, tropical drinks, and local vendors offering handcrafted goods and surfwear.
Spectators can lounge on the sand, cheer on competitors, and participate in interactive beach games.
Evenings conclude with live music performances, bonfires, and stargazing along the coast.
imageTitle: Pro surfers catching waves at Taniti Beach
imageAltText: Surfers riding a large wave with spectators on the beach
heroTitle: Catch the Waves at the Taniti Surf Classic
heroText: Surf’s up! Witness elite surfers and beachside celebrations during the island’s most electrifying event.

title: Jungle Night Hike
shortDescription: Step into a different world as you explore the rainforest after dark. This guided night hike reveals the island’s hidden nocturnal wonders in a truly magical setting.
details: Led by expert guides, this nighttime adventure takes guests deep into Taniti’s lush rainforest trails.
Experience the jungle by moonlight, hearing the sounds of frogs, birds, and rustling leaves all around.
Spot glowing fungi, rare insects, and even the occasional tree-dwelling marsupial under a starlit sky.
Each small group is equipped with headlamps and safety gear to ensure a safe, intimate experience.
Perfect for nature lovers and photographers looking for a unique and unforgettable island excursion.
